special_text:
[+1]: Create a tapped 3/3 black Crocodile creature token with menace.
[-1]: You may cast a copy of Size Up.
[-7]: Each land you control becomes a 3/3 Crocodile creature and gains menace and haste until end of turn.
rules_text2: Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less. [i](Then exile this card. You may cast Irbek later from exile.)[/i]
